com.preemptive.dasho.mapfile

Class MapFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.preemptive.dasho.mapfile.MapFile

  • public final class MapFile
extends java.lang.Object
    An in-memory map file that stores renaming information.

        Stores the map file.

      • hasClasses

        public boolean hasClasses()
        Does the map file contain any class renaming information?
        Returns:

        Find a class by its new name.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
